name: Pink Blossoms Resort (Family Suites)

reviews.title: Wonderful Resort
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Pink Blossoms with our grandchildren. It was much more than we expected. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The suites are huge, and CLEAN. The location is perfect. I can't say enough about it. GREAT PLACE to visit with children. We will go back!

reviews.text: The property is immaculate, parking at the family resort is no problem, service is extremely welcoming and helpful. I have stayed in the smallest of suites and it is plentiful for two. Queen bed, full kitchen area, good size bathroom, pull-out couch with ample living area. TV and DVD player too. Your own private balcony with chairs and plenty of dresser space to unpack in (since in this smallest suite there is no closet).
reviews.title: great accommodations

reviews.text: It's location makes it walkable to everywhere - the lovely town, Perkins Cove and of course Cafe Amore (excellent breakfast!) is right next door. The trolley is right out front also, but the walk can't be beat on a beautiful fall day in this area.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel
Loved it - a dream come true!
reviews.text: Most remarkable is the price for the quality and location.

aka: Pink Blossoms Resort (Family Suites) Hotel Ogunquit
description: Relax in comfort on Shore Road - within easy strolling distance of Ogunquit Beach, the Marginal Way, and the picture perfect harbor of Perkins Cove. Stay in one of our beautifully appointed, contemporary rooms. All 30 units feature individual climate control, Cable TV, phones, dining tables, and fully equipped kitchenettes. Tennis, outdoor pool, hot tub, basketball, shuffle board, in-room high-speed internet, golf nearby. All rooms non-smoking. Family owned and operated for over 20 years.
